My husband and I came here on the recommendation of our concierge at our hotel in Barcelona.  They booked a reservation for us for dinner -- a must as this place is quite small.  They have two seatings for dinner, 8pm and 10pm (or around that time).  We had a reservation at the 8pm seating.  We were seated immediately and offered a glass of wine. Because we weren't familiar with the menu (it's all in Spanish), we told our server, who spoke fluent English, that we trusted his choices and wine pairings and to bring us whatever were his favorites.  We were not disappointed.  The wine flowed (and was delicious!) and we dined on egg carpaccio, octopus, steak, scallops, and foie gras.  Dessert was a dense chocolate cake with pistachio ice cream.  We absolutely enjoyed and loved our experience here and would recommend to anyone traveling through Barcelona.  Just make sure to book a reservation!
